origin.origins.human.description:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§oNone§r

 A human's fate is more open than most - venture forth with no benefits or drawbacks.
origin.otherworldorigins.race/human.name: Human
origin.otherworldorigins.race/human.desc:
• Medium Size 
• +1 to All Stats§r
• 10% Discount from Villagers§r

Humans are versatile and adaptable, with a balanced set of abilities that allow them to excel in various fields.
origin.otherworldorigins.race/human_vari:
• Medium Size 
• +2 to Two Stats
• Bonus Feat

Human variants trade their balanced abilities for specialized skills and a unique feat.
origin.otherworldorigins.race/elf.name: Elf
origin.otherworldorigins.race/elf.descri:
• Medium Size§r
• +2 Dexterity§r
• Darkvision§r

§lSubraces§r:
High Elf
Wood Elf

§lLore:§r Elves are graceful and agile, with keen senses and a natural affinity for magic.
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/elf/hig:
• +1 Intelligence§r
• +1 Luck§r

High elves are known for their intellect and magical aptitude.
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/elf/woo:
• +1 Intelligence§r
• +1 Speed§r

Wood elves are swift and perceptive, at home in the forests and wild lands.
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/elf/dro:
• +1 Intelligence§r
• Access to Ancient Reforging§r

Drow, or dark elves, are known for their cunning and mastery of ancient magics.
origin.otherworldorigins.race/half_elf.d:
• Medium Size§r
• +2 Charisma§r
• Darkvision§r
• +1 to Two Other Ability Scores§r

Half-elves combine the best traits of humans and elves, resulting in a charismatic and versatile race.

Available Subraces:
High Half-Elf
Wood Half-Elf
Drow Half-Elf
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/half_el:
• +1 Intelligence§r
• +1 Cantrip§r

High half-elves inherit the magical aptitude of their high elf parentage.

• +1 Intelligence§r
• +1 Speed§r

Wood half-elves inherit the swiftness and perception of their wood elf ancestry.

• +1 Intelligence§r
• Access to Ancient Reforging§r

Drow half-elves inherit the cunning and magical prowess of their drow parentage.
origin.otherworldorigins.race/dwarf.name: Dwarf
origin.otherworldorigins.race/dwarf.desc:
• Small Size§r
• -10% Speed§r
• +2 Constitution§r
• Darkvision§r
• Dwarven Resilience (Resistance to Poison Damage)§r

Dwarves are sturdy and resilient, with a natural affinity for craftsmanship and mining.

Available Subraces:
Hill Dwarf
Mountain Dwarf
Duergar
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/dwarf/h:
• +1 Building§r
• +0.5 Hearths (Increases every level)§r

Hill dwarves are known for their resilience and skill in construction.
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/dwarf/m:
• +1 Strength§r
• +1 Defence§r

Mountain dwarves are strong and hardy, excelling in combat and craftsmanship.
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/dwarf/d:
• +1 Intelligence§r
• Access to Ancient Reforging§r

Duergar, or gray dwarves, are known for their cunning and mastery of ancient magics.
origin.otherworldorigins.race/halfling.d:
• Small Size§r
• -10% Speed§r
• +2 Dexterity§r
• +1 Luck§r

Halflings are nimble and lucky, with a natural talent for stealth and precision.

§lSubraces§r:
Lightfoot Halfling
Stout Halfling
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/halflin:
• +1 Charisma§r
• +10% Speed§r

Lightfoot halflings are naturally charismatic and quicker than their kin.

• +1 Constitution§r
• Resistance to Poison Damage§r

Stout halflings are hardier than most, with a natural resistance to toxins.
origin.otherworldorigins.race/gnome.name: Gnome
origin.otherworldorigins.race/gnome.desc:
• Small Size§r
§l§c- 10% Speed§r
• +2 Intelligence§r
• Darkvision§r
• +1 Luck§r

Gnomes are curious and clever, with a knack for magic and tinkering.

Available Subraces:
Rock Gnome
Forest Gnome
Deep Gnome
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/gnome/r:
• +1 Constitution§r

Rock gnomes are inventive and hardy, with a talent for creating magical devices.
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/gnome/f:
• +1 Strength§r

Forest gnomes are nimble and stealthy, with a natural affinity for illusion magic.
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/gnome/d:
• Access to Ancient Reforging§r

Deep gnomes, or svirfneblin, are masters of stealth and stone-craft.
origin.otherworldorigins.race/dragonborn:
• Medium Size§r
• +2 Strength§r
• +1 Charisma§r
• Draconic Ancestry§r
• Breath Weapon§r
• 10% Damage Resistance§r

Dragonborn are proud and noble, with draconic heritage granting them unique abilities.

Available Subraces:
Black, Blue, Brass, Bronze, Copper, Gold, Green, Red, Silver, White
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/dragonb: Black Dragonborn

• Acid Breath Attack§r

Black dragonborn possess the corrosive breath of their black dragon ancestors.
Blue Dragonborn

• Lightning Breath Attack§r

Blue dragonborn channel the lightning breath of their blue dragon forebears.
Brass Dragonborn

• Fire Breath Attack§r

Brass dragonborn inherit the fiery breath of their brass dragon ancestors.
Bronze Dragonborn

• Lightning Breath Attack§r

Bronze dragonborn wield the lightning breath of their bronze dragon ancestors.
Copper Dragonborn

• Acid Breath Attack§r

Copper dragonborn possess the acidic breath of their copper dragon forebears.
Gold Dragonborn

• Fire Breath Attack§r

Gold dragonborn channel the intense fire breath of their gold dragon ancestors.
Green Dragonborn

• Poison Breath Attack§r

Green dragonborn inherit the poisonous breath of their green dragon forebears.
Red Dragonborn

• Fire Breath Attack§r

Red dragonborn wield the devastating fire breath of their red dragon ancestors.
Silver Dragonborn

• Cold Breath Attack§r

Silver dragonborn possess the freezing breath of their silver dragon forebears.
White Dragonborn

• Cold Breath Attack§r

White dragonborn channel the icy breath of their white dragon ancestors.
origin.otherworldorigins.race/tiefling.d:
• Medium Size§r
• +2 Charisma§r
• +1 Intelligence§r
• Darkvision§r
• Hellish Resistance§r
• Infernal Legacy§r

Tieflings are beings with infernal heritage, possessing both charm and innate magical abilities.
origin.otherworldorigins.race/undead.des:
Undead are creatures that have been reanimated after death, each with unique strengths and weaknesses.

Available Subraces:
Zombie
Skeleton
Wither Skeleton
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/undead/:
• Medium Size§r
§l§c- Sun Resistance§r
• Resistance to Poison§r
• +1 Defence§r

Zombies are undead creatures, resilient but vulnerable to sunlight.

• Medium Size§r
§l§c- Bow Resistance§r
• +5 Bow Damage§r
• +1 Dexterity§r

Skeletons are agile undead, skilled with bows but vulnerable to them as well.

• Tall Size§r
§l§c- Sword Resistance§r
• +5 Sword Damage§r
• +1 Strength§r

Wither Skeletons are powerful undead warriors, deadly with swords but vulnerable to them.
origin.otherworldorigins.race/other.name: Other
origin.otherworldorigins.race/other.desc:
This category includes unique races that don't fit into the standard classifications, each with their own special abilities and traits.

Available Subraces:
Githyanki
Hobgoblin
Goblin
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/other/g:
• Tall Size§r
§l§c- Water Resistance§r
• Teleport with Ender Pearls§r
• +1 Defence§r

Githyanki are psionic warriors from the Astral Plane, with innate teleportation abilities.
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/other/h:
• Medium Size§r
• Gold Proficiency (x1.5 Gold Stats)§r
• Heat Resistance§r
• +1 Strength§r

Hobgoblins are disciplined and militaristic, with a natural affinity for gold and combat.
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/other/g:
• Medium Size§r
• Gold Proficiency (x1.5 Gold Stats)§r
• Cold Resistance§r
• +1 Dexterity§r

Goblins are small, nimble creatures with a knack for acquiring and using gold.
power.otherworldorigins.alfiq/clawed.des: Alfiq have razor sharp retractable claws; they deal extra damage with empty paws, and can climb up and cling to steep surfaces (Can be toggled)
otherworldorigins.uncastable: You can't use this ability right now.
otherworld.message.charisma_save: You were seen committing a crime, but spared punishment thanks to Charisma.
